entities.description: Instances of fraudulent activities conducted via electronic means.
Cases where personal information is stolen and used without permission.
Unauthorized access to computer systems and data.
Misappropriation of funds placed in one’s trust or belonging to one’s employer.
Crimes involving stolen property.
Acts of destroying or damaging property.
Violations related to illegal drug or narcotic activities.
Offenses involving the possession or use of drug-related equipment.
Acts of sexual intercourse between individuals who are closely related.
Sexual activity with individuals who are below the age of consent.
Offenses involving pornography or other obscene material.
Illegal activities related to betting or wagering.
Operating, promoting, or assisting gambling activities.
Offenses involving illegal gambling equipment.
Tampering with sporting events or activities.
Participating in or soliciting prostitution.
Assisting or encouraging prostitution.
Engaging in the act of purchasing prostitution services.
Offering, giving, receiving, or soliciting something of value to influence official actions.
Offenses related to the illegal handling or possession of weapons.
Trafficking of individuals for commercial sex acts.
The intentional killing of another person without lawful justification.
Causing death through reckless or negligent actions.
Killing of a person under circumstances that allow for self-defense or other lawful reasons.

relationships.description: Relates a crime to the person who committed it.
Indicates that a crime involves a substance such as drugs or alcohol.
Relates a crime to the person affected by it.
Indicates the location where the crime occurred.
Indicates the official offense code recorded for a crime.
